website_summaries.verdict: L-Arginine supplement in loose powder form made from raw ingredients and offers better absorption.
pros: Natural ingredients, 100% "raw" with no fillers, preservatives, or animal-derived contents
Pure ingredients, no artificial dyes or sweeteners
Combined with "Astragin" (a combination of 2 root extracts) for better absorption
Less expensive than other powder forms
cons: Nearly 10% of buyers didn't like the taste
Smaller percentage saw no benefit from using the supplement

customer_reviews.title: Better pumps!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love L- Arginine & this one is serious. Better blood flow that leads to you looking more vascular & getting up better quality reps. I increased my bench press by 20lbs which lead to better trash talk with my gym buddies. I increased my bedroom activity by at least 20 strokes which lead to better trash talk with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: James Bryant

customer_reviews.title: This product is recommended to stack with the pres workout
customer_reviews.text: This product is recommended to stack with the pres workout. In my opinion I highly recommend to take them separately because the taste of this product takes great mental strength to swallow. There is no other way to drink this in my opinion but to take it as a shot with water. As far as the product performance, I do see a massive blood flow in my muscles while I pump iron.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Not as Descibed
customer_reviews.text: QUALITY MATTERS (Zero Fillers or Other Ingredients. Really??? The Supplement facts on the item I received is not the same as on Amazons website. Look at the photo attached. 5 grams of L-Arginine .025 grams of AstraGin and the rest 2.975 grams of Citric Acid, Natural Flavor, and Silica. I will be returning immediately. False advertising.
customer_reviews.author: DJBTRIP8

customer_reviews.title: Fast recovery between sparring rounds
customer_reviews.text: I had never tried a supplement L-Arginine before so I didn't know what expect. Used it before going to my jiu jitsu practice I suggest and after few rounds I noticed that my recovery time was faster. This surely is a great advantage. Of course this is not magic (you need to put the time in the mats) but if I can get a small edge then I surely will do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Stefano Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but mix with juice or other flavored powder to mask the taste
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good and provides blood flow for muscle pumps. I mix it with my BCAA drink and have it through out my work out. I will caution everyone that the taste is not good. I don't mean that it is not my preference in taste, I mean it is horrible tasting. So you have to mix it with other flavored drinks or juice to make it tolerable. Just wanted to caution everyone before purchasing it. But the product does work in producing muscle pumps and I have taken many different nitric oxide pills and this powder makes my veins protrude faster than any of them.
customer_reviews.author: John DTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: this is the best l-aginine I have EVER used
customer_reviews.text: I have been utilizing l-arginine items for quite a long while as a component of a cardiovascular regimen without seeing any genuine evident medical advantages, but then my Genius l-argenine came in the mail and changed everything. With Genius l-aginine, I saw an complete reduction of lactic acid develop/sore muscles after even my most intense training sessions. The pump I experienced during these workout was second to none, I even stopped taking other pre workouts all together. Taking just 1 serving per day - 30 minutes prior to training, has become my new tradition and superstition. With that being said, this is the best l-aginine I have EVER used. 10/10 recommend trying this supplement
customer_reviews.author: Jack Matthews

customer_reviews.title: With all raw supplements you have to be prepared for a very bitter taste but this is the first raw arginine product I have bought and LOVED. I have this one and one other in ...
customer_reviews.text: I order a lot of raw supplements so that I can be in control of the dosage depending what my desired results are for that particular day. With all raw supplements you have to be prepared for a very bitter taste but this is the first raw arginine product I have bought and LOVED. I have this one and one other in my cabinet right now and I have to take a mass load of the other just to get the same effect as one scoop of this and many days I don't even need a full scoop depending what type of results I'm looking for that day. Exceptional product!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon McMillan

customer_reviews.title: Great for athletes!
customer_reviews.text: As a sprinter I was extremely excited to try the Genius L-Arginine because let's be real....our body's take a beating in the weight room and on the track. L-Arginine is proven to help with blood flow and stimulate NO production as well as playing a role in GH and creatine production in the body. This can all help you prepare and recover from those hard training cycles!
customer_reviews.author: VLedtke, MS, ATC

customer_reviews.title: Great nitric oxide support
customer_reviews.text: One thing that everyone is going to say about this product: it tastes terrible. If you ever try an amino acid naturally, no flavors or additives, they're going to taste like this. Amino acids are very basic which is why you get that alkaline/ammonia taste to it. That being said, mix it with something acidic and it will neutralize the flavor. This product is very pure and effective. I mix one scoop with Genius Pre and get the added nitric oxide benefits and endurance benefits of arginine. I get a great pump and cardiovascular support that greatly benefits my workout. 5 grams per scoop with 30 servings per container.
customer_reviews.author: jjon

customer_reviews.title: Wroth it so far and hoping to try other products from this brand, they actually seem worth trying.
customer_reviews.text: I've been taking this product for quite a while and so far, It's been working at least in the sexual department. I don't think it has helped when I workout but it helps me have erections more often. I also got the diet pills (which I've only been using for 2 days now and think it could maybe be working but I will wait a month and hope to get results) I am getting the pro-gt since I'm trying to get leaner before I go on my trip to Arizona.
customer_reviews.author: Elias

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, flavor is just alright
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about the product was the way it mixed and the flavor itself. It is not overbearing and I could take it daily with water or a juice for faster digestion. The product works well, I noticeably see a harder pump in the gym and can last a little longer than normal, it doesn’t make me feel tingly or doesn’t give me any heart palpitations. The price is also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like the pump I get from it during the workout ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the pump I get from it during the workout and also increased blood flow during erections.. Plus a good combination of diet I can assume. Its not that expensive for the benefits you get from it as well..The only reason I knocked off a star was because Ironically the nonflavored taste Horrific by its self trust me!! Try mixing it with a preworkout or something to cover up the taste because its pretty much torture with just water..
customer_reviews.author: ces

customer_reviews.title: Basic L-argenine that you can feel
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is just L argenine and nothing nothing else. Definelty feel an increase in cardiovascular performance. It's nice because I can take this before bed and I feel like I can breathe freely giving better sleep. Taste could be improved but not a big deal to me. Just missed with gatoraid or juice.
customer_reviews.author: BParka

customer_reviews.title: Tastes terrible!
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how well this product works, but the taste is terrible, even when mixed with whey protein, which I usually mix it with. It tastes sour and very unappetizing.I won’t purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: fhughes47

customer_reviews.title: Does not provide adequate pump
customer_reviews.text: Product was listed as lemon flavor, but has a terrible chemical taste. Does not taste like lemon at all. Product also does not provide adequate pump as described. Will be returning for another product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: STACK IT!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great with there Genius Pre supplement! L-Arginine intensifys your "pump"! And gives you a sense of more stamina! I def felt the difference with and without L-arginine with my pre! I would give 5 stars but the little downside that can be easily fixed is the taste! It taste kinda weird! The way I do it is I down it with some orange juice or apple before taking my pre with it! Other than that the effects of it are amazing I would def reccomend for those looking who are looking to intensify there pump🔥
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Padilla

customer_reviews.title: You need this in your life💯
customer_reviews.text: Dang! This is amazing! I could honestly feel the difference when using Genius Brand L Arginine! Tastes great and mixes well with Genius Pre and Genius Creatine! My workouts have been 💯 and my energy is through the roof! No crash post workout! Jump on the Gains Train and get The Genius Brand in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Lane Marley Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great L-Arginine to mix with water before gym
customer_reviews.text: I take l-arginine before workouts together with some creatine. I feel that helps me a lot to push my body to perform better, expecialy when I find myself in the gym after an 8 hours shift. Genius l-arginine seems to me to be a good product, clean, easy to mix with water, an ok taste(almost none) ,and most importantly it works.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A.

customer_reviews.title: pure L-Arginine powder with no unnecessary chemicals or fillers
customer_reviews.text: Another home run from Genius Brand! The beauty of this is it’s simplicity: pure L-Arginine powder with no unnecessary chemicals or fillers. Works extremely well at increasing blood flow to muscles, and help to increase stamina. I absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hemminger

customer_reviews.title: L-Arginine supplemented
customer_reviews.text: This L-Arginine is top notch! I'll be honest the taste isn't the best (4/5) (for all L-Arginine products) but mixed with AstraGin it makes the combo more prevalent. To make the taste better always mix L-Arginine with lemon or some acid based juice. I felt an increase in vascularity in the gym as well as increased blood flow to muscles. I'm stacking with Genius Pre and definitely recommend it to supplement on those heavy weight days.
customer_reviews.author: austin1666

customer_reviews.title: Best L-Arginine in the market
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used L-arginine for a very long time. I’m currently using many of Genius supplements. In which I must say, there absolute the best out there. I decided to try L-arginine as I’m looking for endurance and muscle gain. I’ve used this product for about a month. I must say the results speaks for themselves. I’m super satisfied with this brand. I’m looking looking forward to my second round of L-Arginine.
customer_reviews.author: Avellanana

customer_reviews.title: Another good supplement from the Genius brand!
customer_reviews.text: I use the Genius brand L-Arginine pre and post-workout and can feel the difference. The supplement has a "lemony" taste to it (which I quite enjoy) and dissolves fairly well in water. However, I typically blend my dosage with orange juice along with other supplements I take. Again, another good product from this brand -love it!
customer_reviews.author: thatguy2257

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect ingredients
customer_reviews.text: "Other ingredients" are listed as "None" - look at the font it looks different. I purchased this based on their claim and the product actually contains, under "other ingredients" following: Citric Acid, Natural Flavors, Silica.
customer_reviews.author: AMZSHPPR

customer_reviews.title: Amazing taste
customer_reviews.text: Arginine typically tastes horrible. But this product makes the taste quite pleasant. I bought two others: one from Bulk Supplements and another from a different third party and they were incredibly gross. I’ll purchase this continuously
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Aftertaste is better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I first tried a different brand taste was bad, I then bought Genius brand L-Arginine that has a lemon flavor which is much better tasting. It works like advertised I'm mixing a little in drinks like Mai Tai's and Tequila sunrises does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Rvdan

customer_reviews.title: Good Value. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Decent taste. Good value. Great quality. Mixes well. Definitely one of the best L-Arginine products tried. Real difference felt and seen. Would definitely recommend this L-Arginine to anyone looking to "feel the pump" and increase their blood flow and vascularity.
customer_reviews.author: Russell & Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: It does the job I need it to
customer_reviews.text: I’ve really enjoyed using this product. From what I’ve learned, most of the worlds supply L Arginine powder comes from two main sources. Which means, the choice for a product comes down to the quality of the manufacturer and the additional supplements and additives added. For me, this product does it job, as my heart health is a major focus of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Will-I-AM

customer_reviews.title: Genius Brand's Swiss Army knife supplement!
customer_reviews.text: I have two daily uses for this awesome product. Every morning I mix two tablespoons of apple cider vinegar with one scoop of Genius L-Arginine and it masks the awful taste of acv very well. Helps get the blood flowing early in the morning before heading into work as well. Then I stack Genius L-Arginine with Genius Pre after work as I head in for an intense gym session. One of the best pumps I've felt during working out.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: First off I really enjoy the colors of the bottle. Very pleasant and not too over the top. Secondly, I enjoy the way it adds to my pre workout stack. I build my own pre workout and it fits nicely into there. I use citrulline Malate, this l arginine, betaine, taurine, and a tier 1 preworkout. I use the tier 1 simply for the simplicity of it and that it’s a good base for my stack. I do plan on continuing to use genius products (using the genius mushrooms right now). Overtime I’ll try to use each product for something different but as of now the arginine is working just fine for me!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: overall i highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this product for a few days and i have noticed an increase in my endurance! I noticed the most change by the 3rd day of use after drinking it twice a day for my morning and evening workouts. i was able to increase my rep range to 15 when using moderate weight! overall i highly recommend this product! and the taste was almost similar to an unsweetened tea
customer_reviews.author: Tyquincia Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I used this for the first time today and I really love the pump it gave me. I had a long day at work and didn't even feel like working out but I pushed through it and took a scoop of this mixed in a little bit of water and I had a great workout. It mixes in almost clear with water and it doesn't have the best taste, but for the results that it gave me it was worth it. I took this in conjunction with the burn and the caffeine pill. Worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased L-Arginine and have been taking it daily with other products before I hit the gym. I have noticed a huge difference with vascularity. Also it gives me an enormous amount of energy that pushes me to no limits while I’m under the weights. I have put on a noticeable amount of size since the start of taking this product. It has also helped me sexually also giving me a ton of energy in the bedroom. I recommend this product to all my friends and family. Can’t get enough of it!!
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low price
customer_reviews.text: No headaches from this product. Some lower quality Arginine products give me a headache. Mixes well but the flavor is a little light. I didn’t mind much because I mix it with my pre workout powder. Good value from a good brand. Would recommend for anyone looking to add a boost to your pump during your workout.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I was amazed at how well the product worked and the speed at which I was able to feel the dose kick in after taking the arginine. I take a single scoop shortly after I awaken in the morning and it is more than enough to get me going for the day with copious amounts of energy to do it. I’d say it’s even better than the cups of coffee I’ve supplemented in the past. As far as drive during my workout, I can push myself just about twice as hard as I normally could have before getting winded.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great arginine supplement!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many arginine supplements over the years. Some arginine supplements gave me good results but nothing like Genius Arginine. It gives me great vascularity and muscle pumps. Genius Arginine helps me with cardio at the gym and cardio in the bedroom. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to add arginine to their supplement regimen. I can’t wait to try more of Genius products. Thank you Genius
customer_reviews.author: Jason Rossi

customer_reviews.title: Good for pump and focus
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the product to increase my pump during strength training and weight lifting sessions. I take it 15-20 minutes prior to working out. I noticed right away better pumps and performance in the gym. I have increased stamina during long workouts. The manufacturer recommends taking up to three times a day so I tried with my protein shake at night. I noticed more energy at night and mental focus. That's definitely an added bonus for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Macedo

customer_reviews.title: It just works. Noticeable after just a few short days.
customer_reviews.text: I initially didn't think much of this particular product and didn't think it would be as successful of a product in general as it is but boy was I wrong. It just works. Most people understand that L-Arginine is a vasodilator and it is absolutely is. I can feel a major difference in blood flow in my body, and the sheer impact on my muscles. I know its different from person to person but personally this product works. I've bought it three times already and its hold true each time.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Made my stomach hurt
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t see if this product worked because after taking it, it messed with my stomach unfortunately. So honestly it could be an amazing product and maybe it’s just me that reacts differently.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob G.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I recently found out that Arginine is a beta blocker so it’s great for my husbands blood pressure. He likes the taste and has no problem drinking it. Will keep buying this product for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, good results
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been great! Have been stacking Arginine with some fermented beet powder for its nitrate enhancing properties and couldn't be happier with the results. The fact that your product tastes great and is really convenient just add to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: PDXgoat

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and felt the pump!
customer_reviews.text: This L-arginine was great- I like that’s pure arginine and nothing else so I can just mix it easily with water. It’s a great value for the price too- I’ve tried other powder arginine and the taste is really really bad even mixed with orange juice but the lemonade flavor taste with this was great and mixes easily with water. Gives a good all day pump too! I’ve already ordered 4 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Energy without the crashing effects of pre-workout
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit skeptical about purchasing this product at first. This fitness industry is full of scams and empty promises. To my surprise, this product has delivered beyond my expectations. I take it once daily, 30 minutes before my workout. I feel clarity, focus and energy without the downside effects of pre-workout. I totally recommend this products, and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rochainys

customer_reviews.title: Really good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the best arginine that I've taken. Works well with the rest of my supplements. Absorbs quickly, doesn't affect my stomach, provides great energy morning/evening. Great pump as well!! Taste like lemon water. Really not bad at all. Not sure what all the fuss is about.
customer_reviews.author: Reggie

customer_reviews.title: It works and with no bs side effects
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been adding it to my workouts for a more than a year now and am able to get higher reps and a far better feeling than without. Its simply a must for me to have before going to the gym.

customer_reviews.title: Very good tasting arginine.
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find arginine that tastes good. The unflavored ones taste so bad that not even mixing with juice gets it better. This one tastes like natural lemon so it's great. The price is reasonable. Improves blood flow.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed using L-Arginine. I take it in the morning as well as before workouts. It seems to give me a little extra boost to be able to perform longer. I also like the taste - it is not off-putting at all - in fact, it’s quite pleasant. I usually don’t care about the taste of these type of products but it’s definitely a plus. This is my first time using l-arginine by itself and it definitely seems worth it so far. I would recommend to others as well.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me up at night
customer_reviews.text: Had absolutely zero effect when it comes to putting you to sleep, infact, it kept me up for hours. I'm not sure if it's the pills or the placebo, but I did wake up earlier than usual and didn't feel tired. However it was too early and when I went back to bed and woke up, I was exhausted. I don't think it's effective when I get only 4-5 hrs of sleep when I take this stuff.

customer_reviews.title: Taste is terrible

But over all this bottle will be part of my health routine in the morning.

I definitely see it working and can recommend it. I noticed it while I was working out and would say as long as you can mask the taste use it.

My workouts are focused and challenging so with the extra energy I’ve seen noticeable improvements not only physically but also mentall.

customer_reviews.text: The pump during and after my workouts was great. The flavor and mixability of this product is solid. I would 100% buy again.

customer_reviews.text: I noticed this product online on amazon. I tested it out because it seemed great and all natural. I did notice good pumps in the gym but nothing too crazy. I did enjoy the product and mixed it with my pre workout. The taste wasn’t too great alone so I would say adding more flavors would Be better for the product all around. product_meta.title: Genius L Arginine Powder - Fermented L-Arginine Nitric Oxide Supplement, Natural Muscle Builder & NO Booster for Healthy Blood Pressure, Protein Synthesis and Strength Building, Lemon, 30 Sv
product_meta.description:
Genius L-Arginine – Increase blood flow, feel the pump.
Experience the benefits of our potent L Arginine supplement complex that contains two simple yet very effective ingredients: Fermented and vegetarian Ajipure L-Arginine, and AstraGin (Panax notoginseng, and Astragalus membranaceus). The most potent and pure Arginine powder on the market. The ideal combination for muscle building and nitric oxide enhancement. Genius L Arginine formula is designed to boost Nitric Oxide levels, increase energy, improve peak athletic performance and build lean body mass. Absolutely no artificial flavoring, sweeteners, dyes, or banned substances in Genius L-Arginine. 100% clean, and all natural. Fuel your body with the highest quality ingredients, know you are choosing the best.

Specific benefits of Genius L Arginine include:

✓ Increase Vascularity, Vein Popping, and Workout Performance

✓ Boost Nitric Oxide Levels & Expand Blood Vessels

✓ Support Metabolism and Increase Endurance 

✓ Support Peak Athletic Performance and Lean Body Mass

Choose Genius, Be Genius.
feature_bullets: QUALITY MATTERS (Zero Fillers or Other Ingredients) - Genius Arginine asserts “The AjiPure Difference”. Purity, Safety and Efficacy are what sets Genius products apart from the competition. No contaminants or label fraud!

NITRIC OXIDE BOOSTER – 5 Grams of Pure Arginine in every scoop guarantees results you can feel! Arginine essentially becomes nitric oxide in the body, leading to increased vasodilation. Stack w/ Genius Pre for INSANE pumps

TRIGGER MUSCLE GROWTH – Arginine is a building block of protein that our body can’t create naturally. While the increased vasodilation results in greater protein synthesis, pure (Genius) arginine triggers the body to make more protein as well!

BLOOD PRESSURE – It has been shown that arginine reduces blood pressure in healthy adults. More & more studies are being published, confirming the research! Remember, quality matters when looking for desired results
MALE PERFORMANCE – While arginine has many benefits, increased blood flow is that the top of the list. Yes... It benefits “other” areas as well. Trust us, you’ll feel a difference
